meanings.definition: On the far side of; past.
meanings.sent1: The playground is beyond the school building.
meanings.sent2: The river flows beyond the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased a mouse beyond the garden fence.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness goes beyond what is expected.
meanings.sent5: The treasure lies beyond the old oak tree.

meanings.sent2: The view from the top of the hill is beyond beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The cake was beyond delicious; it was heavenly!
meanings.sent5: The storm caused damage beyond repair.

meanings.sent1: She went beyond her usual duties to help a friend.
meanings.sent2: The store is just beyond the park.
meanings.sent3: The dog ran beyond the yard and into the street.
meanings.sent4: His generosity goes beyond what is expected.
meanings.sent5: The story goes beyond mere words; it touches the heart.
